text: This list of nicknamed dinosaur fossils is a list of fossil dinosaur specimens given informal names in addition to their institutional catalogue numbers. It excludes informal appellations that are purely descriptive (e.g., "the Fighting Dinosaurs", "the Trachodon Mummy"). ==Ankylosaurs== {| class="wikitable sortable" align="center" width="100%" |- !
